answers.answer_text: Answers related to plastic pollution calculation, biodegradation, and environmental impacts.

sub_answers.marking_notes:
1 mark for 11(.01). 1 mark for 'million tonnes'.
Accept 11 000 000 / 11 010 000 tonnes / tons.
Converted to standard form = 1.101 × 10^7 or 1.1 × 10^7 tonnes.
Accept 110.1 × 10^5 tonnes and variations.

1 mark for decomposition.
1 mark for bacteria or fungi.
Max 7 marks. 1 mark per valid harmful effect described.
